title: Unexpected panic when building with WebAssembly

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm trying to port the `minifb` crate to WebAssembly: [repo](https://github.com/tversteeg/rust_minifb/tree/e8caebb3d1ef0b8a7fbcba910b587de553d2f8a2).

The last code I added [was](https://github.com/tversteeg/rust_minifb/blob/e8caebb3d1ef0b8a7fbcba910b587de553d2f8a2/src/os/wasm/mod.rs#L3):

    extern crate lazy_static;

I tried to run the [`wasm.rs`](https://github.com/tversteeg/rust_minifb/blob/e8caebb3d1ef0b8a7fbcba910b587de553d2f8a2/examples/wasm.rs) example with the following command:

    export RUST_BACKTRACE=1 && cargo build --example wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown


I expected to see this happen: A reasonable error message.

Instead, this happened: I got an unexpected panic.

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:

    rustc 1.25.0-nightly (15a1e2844 2018-01-20)
    binary: rustc
    commit-hash: 15a1e2844dfea7850be5c6c901b67ceff370b0eb
    commit-date: 2018-01-20
    host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
    release: 1.25.0-nightly
    LLVM version: 4.0

Backtrace:

	thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
	  left: `2`,
	 right: `1`', librustc_trans/back/link.rs:1403:5
	note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
	stack backtrace:
	   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
		     at libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49
	   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::print
		     at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:68
		     at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:57
	   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
		     at libstd/panicking.rs:380
	   3: std::panicking::default_hook
		     at libstd/panicking.rs:390
	   4: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
		     at libstd/panicking.rs:576
	   5: std::panicking::begin_panic
		     at libstd/panicking.rs:537
	   6: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
		     at libstd/panicking.rs:521
	   7: rustc_trans::back::link::link_natively
	   8: rustc_trans::back::link::link_binary
	   9: <rustc_trans::LlvmTransCrate as rustc_trans_utils::trans_crate::TransCrate>::link_binary
	  10: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
	  11: rustc_driver::run_compiler

	error: Could not compile `minifb`.
